title: Just Dessert
description: Dessertâ€¦the perfect remedy when nothing in life seems to be going right.What do you do when you are the sole protector of four children, your brothers and sisters? When each day is haunted by disappointment, disillusionment and desperation? When you believe that everyone who ever loved you, including God, has abandoned you?You bake a pie, of course.What do you do when you find a woman whose heart is consumed by fear? Who does not know how to trust? Who scoffs at your faith and throws your kindness back in your face?You eat a pie, of course.
author: Heather   Gray
